Name: Wild Baffo
About the game: In the bizarre world of Baffoland, a man's moustache is his power. But yours has been stolen - on the eve of the biggest day of yoru life! Fight through hordes of enemies and numerous bosses in five different scenarios in your quest to reclaim your beloved facial hair. Gameplay is faithful to the vintage light-gun arcade classics. With full controller, touch, and light gun compatibility, you can play the game in whatever way best suits you. Who stole your moustache and why do they want it so bad? Get to the bottom of a mystery that goes far deeper than it seems at first glance. What started as a normal day will end up changing Baffoland foreverâ€¦ Compete against yourself and others on the leaderboard to get the best time and score in the whole world. Can you get 100% accuracy, and complete the game in the quickest time possible to get maximum points?
